Name.label: Malignant mixed MÃ¼llerian tumor of the ovary

TextSection.Contents: Malignant mixed MÃ¼llerian tumor of the ovary is a rare and very aggressive neoplasm presenting most commonly in postmenopausal women and is composed of adenocarcinomatous and sarcomatous elements and, depending on the types of these elements, can be classified as homologous or heterologous. It often has a poor prognosis.

Synonym.label: Ovarian malignant mixed epithelial mesenchymal tumor
